headline: Design Systems Engineer
tagline: Empowering Design Excellence at Scale: Unleashing Creativity, Enabling Collaboration, and Amplifying Impact
description: I'm a Design Systems Engineer. That tagline above ☝️ is brought to you by ChatGPT 4 🤖.
I build Design Systems with Design Tokens. I love scaling design and applying systems thinking. I also love building teams through mentoring and leadership.
Arriving at Design Systems wasn't a straightforward journey. See how I got there below 👇.
